message.body: Awesome! Are you leaving the city for thanksgiving?
Nice! Im actually going to be in Pennsylvania on thanksgiving but ill be back on Friday night. So we can hang saturday? Maybe Jordan will plan something...?
Yeah! Hopefully my fam wont derp thanks giving like last year!
Ew thats in a week im totally not excited or anyting.
They did thanks giving on friday - -
Ugh immigrants. I'm actually so excited cuz ill be home for the first time since August!!!
Yeah! And it wasnt an immigrant thing, not everyone could make thursday. Still a derp.
Lol nah daz cool. They do enough immigrant thug stuff as it ir.
Lolz wurd. There are so many international students here who do not understand thanksgiving at all. It's pretty funny
Really? What do they say? Its like all the international kids in my school who dont like liberal arts classes.
They just don't understand the concept of it, nor that of Halloween. They're all like "omg we don't have anything like that in china/India/whatever"
haha shit, its like when people say "i dont like anyone's cooking but my moms."
